name: FreeFall: Danger Skies
description:
Tilt to dodge lethal spikes and collect coins in this fun, fast and addictive experience.

* 24 awesome characters to unlock

* Simple tilt to move controls

* Compete in leaderboards

* Unlock achievements

* Complete challenging tasks

* Easy to learn, difficult to master
